code: import Web3 from'web3';var selectedAccount;export var init=function init(){var provider=window.ethereum;if(typeof provider!=='undefined'){provider.request({method:'eth_requestAccounts'}).then(function(accounts){selectedAccount=accounts[0];console.log("Selected account is ".concat(selectedAccount));}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});window.ethereum.on('accountsChanged',function(accounts){selectedAccount=accounts[0];console.log("Selected account is ".concat(selectedAccount));});}var web3=new Web3(provider);};
